Debrief.Wrappers

Class BuoyPatternWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.PlainWrapper
      • Debrief.Wrappers.BuoyPatternWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, ColoredWatchable, WatchableList, CanEnumerate, Editable, Editable.DoNotHighlightMe, Exportable, HasEditables, Layer, Plottable, Renamable, SupportsPropertyListeners

    public final class BuoyPatternWrapper
extends PlainWrapper
implements WatchableList, Layer, Editable.DoNotHighlightMe
    the BuoyPatternWrapper is a Layer containing a buoypattern
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getNearestTo

        public Watchable[] getNearestTo(HiResDate DTG)
        Description copied from interface: WatchableList
        get the watchable in this list nearest to the specified DTG. If the watchable list has start/finish times, only return a fix if the DTG supplied is during the "live" period of the watchables. If not DTG is present, or an invalid DTG is requested ,return all valid points
        Specified by:
        getNearestTo in interface WatchableList
        Parameters:
        DTG - to search for
        Returns:
        the nearest Watchable
